str2: The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

str2: From epi and choregeo; to furnish besides, i.e. Fully supply, aid or contribute.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: From energes; to be active, efficient.
From dunamai; force; specially, miraculous power.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
From out, out from among, from, suggesting from the interior outwards. A primary preposition denoting origin, from, out.
From a primary ergo; toil; by implication, an act.
From a primary nemo; law, genitive case, specially, (including the volume); also of the Gospel), or figuratively.
Or, than. A primary particle of distinction between two connected terms; disjunctive, or; comparative, than.
From out, out from among, from, suggesting from the interior outwards. A primary preposition denoting origin, from, out.
Hearing, faculty of hearing, ear; report, rumor. From akouo; hearing.
Faith, belief, trust, confidence; fidelity, faithfulness.
